text: Hulaŋ 27.38 Ais 53.12 ahica agɨlaŋ hulaŋ limu hɨhɨle agɨladɨ sɨbɨlɨ lamalama nulɨdɨ akuaba akuaba vihavɨhadami. Nulɨdɨ avi vivi heŋ ala kɨlɨ cɨkaŋ hɨtɨŋ hɨtɨŋ hɨlihua lamalama agɨladɨ hɨvɨ lamalama henaŋ hɨvɨ ifavɨci udaci mɨŋaiahaiaha lalɨlamavɨmi. Mu agadɨ Jisasɨ dɨ human sɨmi kɨlikɨli heŋ mɨŋaiaha lalɨlamavɨmi. Mu agadɨ human sakalɨ kɨlikɨli heŋ mɨŋaiaha lalɨlamavɨmi.
